name: SCHOOL OF AMBIENCE - Voices From A Memory
description:
This is a one hour continuous piece of relaxing, complex, multi layered ambience. This 2010 album is ideal for total relaxation, meditation, massage or yoga. Or for any space cadets out there. The theme of the album is voices triggering memories from the past. Hearing a conversation, people in a bar, children playing, choirs, they can all invoke a memory. The album has been carefully produced to offer a lot of subtleties and complex layering, sampling, synths and effects all designed to enhance your listening experience. FREE postage and packing WORLDWIDE. Just £7.99p (UK Pounds) You can listen to an extract from the album at - http://www.icompositions.com/music/song.php?sid=138213
FRONT COVER BACK COVER One continuous piece of music. This is a self produced and self released quality CD-R (320kbps) with on disc printing. No printed sticky labels here, I print directly onto the CD. Quality colour sleeve designed and printed by the composer. Running time – 60 minutes 3 seconds. Ian Price - School Of Ambience http://www.schoolofambience.com http://www.myspace.com/schoolofambience
